text: Kingsway Hangar is an arena in Edmonton, Alberta. It is located near the Alberta Aviation Museum, and was of the E-Ville Roller Derby in the winter, in case if the Edmonton Sportsdome deflated. But in early 2016, it announced that all games for the E-Ville Roller Derby would be in the Edmonton Sportsdome, vacating the Kingsway Hangar. Category:Indoor arenas in Alberta Category:Sports venues in Edmonton Category:Tourist attractions in Edmonton
title: Kingsway Hangar
